programme.title: Aphasia and studying the human brain
programme.short_synopsis: Details of the study of aphasia and the effect of the music of Mozart on the human brain.
programme.medium_synopsis: A study examining the effect of Mozart on intelligence and how people affected by aphasia offer revelations about the way in which the brain deals with words.
